text: Surah Al-Nahl, (Arabic: سورة النحل) (The Bee), is the sixteenth surah of the Qur'an, the religious book of Muslims. This Surah was revealed in Makkah and has 128 verses. == Naming == This name is derived from the phrase وَأَوْحَى رَبُّكَ لَِلَى النَّحْلِ in verse 7 of this Surah. It is also based on mere signs, or nahl or bee is not the subject of this surah. ==References== == Other websites == *Q16:68, 50+ translations, islamawakened.com *Quran 16 Clear Quran translation *Surah An-Nahl Transliteration and Arabic Text *Surah Al Lahab Category:Chapters in the Quran
title: Surah An-Nahl
